column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Great dinner. Crab cakes are chunky
column3: with a perfect blend of sauce
column4: not too creamy or dry. They also have a slight outer crisp. The oysters were also great
column6: although seems hard to mess up
column7: most places just taste days old or dried out. Recommend the bone in filet mignon
column8: best I've had from any steakhouse downtown. The boneless filet minion wasn't bad
column9: just not as good as David Burkes
column11: just lacked as much flavor. Chocolate cream pie to finish is plenty for two
